intro: Crowea, commonly known as the flame tree, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Myrtaceae and is characterized by its vibrant orange to red flowers that bloom in spring. The plant typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 6 meters. Its leaves are lance-shaped and have a glossy, dark green appearance. Crowea is valued in horticulture for its showy blooms and adaptability to various soil types.
